content:
Sure, here are seven potential members of a questing party that could be sent to stop Alexander:

1. Leo Valdez - A powerful demigod son of Hephaestus, and a skilled mechanic, who could provide valuable support with his ability to create and control fire.
2. Nico di Angelo - A demigod son of Hades, who could use his powers of manipulation of shadows to his advantage in stealth and reconnaissance.
3. Piper McLean - A demigod daughter of Aphrodite and a powerful orator, who could use her charm and persuasion to influence Alexander or any potential allies he may have.
4. Jason Grace - A demigod son of Jupiter, and a natural leader, who could coordinate the group's efforts and provide a strong sense of strategy.
5. Reyna Ramírez-Arellano - A demigod daughter of Bellona, who has served as a praetor of Camp Jupiter and will bring valuable combat and leadership skills to the quest.
6. Hazel Levesque - A demigod daughter of Pluto, who has the ability to control metal and precious stones, which could be useful in battle or for finding hidden treasures.
7. Zoë Nightshade - A demigod daughter of Atlas, and a huntress of Artemis, who will be able to provide a skilled fighting capabilities, as well as knowledge and experience of the wilderness.

Note that this is just one possible scenario, there are many other demigods, who could be suitable for this quest, but the above-mentioned characters are some of the most powerful and well-known demigods.
